reviews.text: We stayed here for a couple of nights as a group of students.
reviews.title: location, location, location and pizza in the cellar

reviews.text: A nice hotel that is worth visiting just because of it's locaton, especially if you're going shopping. The hotel entrance is more or less the shopping mall entrance.
reviews.title: Lower standard Scandic?

likes.liked: — Location, nothing really at the Scandic Europa
likes.disliked: — To summarize it: price value was not acceptable!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were simple and small, just OK.
reviews.title: Very disapointed, far from clean

likes.disliked: — The standard of service and mould in the bathroom

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They served a lovely breakfast, but it was so crowdy there and the food dissapeared quikly..!
reviews.title: good location, small rooms

reviews.text: Since it was the weekend it was also a bit noisy outside too.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel In An Excellent Town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Scandic is a great hotel chain to use. Not only do they normally have above average rooms, they also are tied in with Hilton and their Hilton Honours system.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, good location, good breakfast

reviews.text: The Europa is directly across from the train station, attached to the Brunnsparken Shopping Centre and right in the core of the city. All of that, but even with the windows open, we never had a noise problem and were able to sleep peacefully in our freshly updated rooms. We also took advantage of the Gothenburg Pass (a recommended option) available directly from the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Location and breakfast

reviews.text: A typical Scandinavian breakfast (very busy on the weekend) is available and should be taken advantage of. There aren't really any great perks that we found with the hotel. The pool is very small and the sauna's are separated into male-only and female-only.
reviews.title: Great Location; Clean Hotel
Great place to relax after sightseeing
reviews.text: We would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for convienience, comfort and affordability. Also, Scandic is very reliable.

reviews.title: Great place to stay!!!
reviews.text: Great location, very near Avenue with al the pubs etc!

reviews.title: Fantastic hotel, even better food!
reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel Europa 6 years ago when it was still a Provobis hotel and it was wonderful! The staff was extremely friendly and helpful and the room was furnished beautifully. The bed linnens were of the finest quality, even on the sofa bed and it was kept immaculately. In addition the food at the restaurant was phenomenal! Fresh seafood was brought in every day (the poached salmon was the bst I've ever eaten) and the continental breakfast was HUGE. This hotel was comparable to some of the Four Seasons and Hyatts I've stayed at.

reviews.title: OK, but uninspired
reviews.text: Centrally placed hotel, near station and next to busy shopping precinct. Small bedrooms rather depressing. Poor breakfast. Not to be recommended, unless for a very short business trip.

reviews.title: Great Location
reviews.text: This was our first visit to Sweden, to a city I had never heard of. The Provobis Europa put us right in the center of town, it's attached to a large shopping center and across from the train station. While my husband was doing business, I spent the days walking from one great neighborhood to another, checking out the local shopping, feeling quite safe the whole time. Our room was nicely decorated in the warm wood tones you'd expect in Scandinavia, and the continental breakfast was unbelievable. I would have given the hotel an "excellent" review if they had responded to a letter I sent them after our trip, requesting information on something I saw in the hotel. But they didn't, so I'll say "above average" instead. Gothenborg was great.
This hotel is good for shopping - integrated into a leading shopping center. Good for exploring the center or chosing one of the many boat trips offered at the nearby quai.
reviews.title: Top Scandinavien atmosphere

reviews.text: Business travellers will note the efficient staff and the recreation facilities. Beers in the bar are within the reach of your budget. When dining try the Indian restaurant opposite to the entrance.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: Scandinavian living truly worth the experience.
reviews.title: scandic europa , clean, lively, friendly and way above average

reviews.text: For new arrivals to Gothenburg the hotel location is excellent. Within sight of the train and bus stations. In addition you will not need to use local public transport within the city as the attractions are all within walking distance.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great location
North wales traveller
reviews.text: We had a family room which consisted of a sitting room with tv, armchairs and settee. Settee turned into a bed with a pull out bed. In addition through a dividing wall was a double bed. In effect a room twice the size one gets in the UK.
